name: The Ritual (Naashit's dev stuff)
description:
A downloadable game for windows.

STORY

You are a paranormal investigator, and you have been chosen to investigate a house when the neighbors noticed unusual noises from the basement of the house, is there something going on in the basement ? find it out!

CONTROLS
  • WASD  - Movement
  • E - Interact
  • Shift - Crouch
  • Esc - Pause

Thanks a lot for playing!
